Advanced Contract Award Notice (ACAN): RFP 21120-24-4556464

We are seeking a qualified Contractor to provide Psychiatry Services and Regional Psychiatrist Lead to Correctional Service Canada (CSC) for a 3-year period. The successful bidder will be required to deliver psychiatric care services to offenders in CSC Institutions and Community Correctional Centres within the Ontario Region.

**Psychiatry Services**

The Contractor will provide in-person psychiatric care services to offenders on-site at CSC Institutions and Community Correctional Centres within the Ontario Region, as well as collaborate with the inter-disciplinary health services team. The Contractor must provide psychiatrists who have:

* A current license in good standing to practice psychiatry from the provincial licensing body
* Successfully completed specialty training in psychiatry through a program accredited by the Royal College of Physicians and Surgeons of Canada (RCPSC) or equivalent
* A minimum of 6 months' experience in providing psychiatric care in the last 2 years, with consideration given to residency or fellowship training
* Experience in providing psychiatric care to offenders within a correctional facility or community corrections at the provincial or federal level within the past 10 years

The Contractor's services will include:

* Assessing and treating individual offenders
* Conducting psychiatric examinations and treatments
* Liaising with health care, case management, and correctional program personnel and participating in interdisciplinary team meetings
* Providing advice and recommendations to CSC staff regarding psychiatric care
* Participating in discharge and release planning
* Developing care plans and discharge summaries
* Preparing Community Treatment Orders
* Maintaining accurate medical records
* Maintaining quality of care that meets professionally accepted standards
* Conducting psychiatric assessments for third parties, such as the Parole Board of Canada

**Regional Psychiatrist Lead**

The Contractor will provide one (1) Regional Psychiatrist Lead who will:

* Provide oversight and leadership for mental health services in the Ontario Region
* Collaborate with the CSC Regional and National Health Services management team and other healthcare members to advance the healthcare of inmates
* Participate as a member of the National Medical Advisory Committee
* Chair the Regional Medical Advisory Committee (RMAC)
* Participate in the development, oversight, and coordination of Infection Prevention and Control (IPAC) standards within the region's institutional sites
* Participate in the Accreditation process and quality improvement initiatives in CSC Health Services

**Critical Evaluation Criteria**

To assess the capabilities of the proposed resources, the Contractor must demonstrate a minimum of 35 points overall
